hero.title: Prepare Smarter. Live Better.
hero.subtitle: We bring Swiss quality and valuable free time back to your school day.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: Sunday afternoons at your desk? Nights spent formatting worksheets? We believe: Great teaching doesn't mean sacrificing yourself.
mission.paragraph2: The demands on Swiss educators are constantly increasing. Individualization, digitalization, and administrative hurdles require time – time that's often missing in everyday life. This is exactly where EasyLehrer comes in.
mission.paragraph3: We see ourselves as your digital assistant. We bridge the gap between high didactic standards and limited preparation time. Our goal is to have your back, so you can invest your energy where it's needed most: with your students.

value1.title: Time Savings, Not Stress
value1.description: Our materials are ready to use immediately. Find, print, teach. Your evening belongs to you again.

value2.title: 100% Lehrplan 21
value2.description: No converting Euros to Francs or adapting content. Our materials are tailored specifically for Switzerland.

value3.title: Teacher-Verified
value3.description: We offer quality over quantity. Every material undergoes a quality check by experienced educators.

origin.title: From Practice, For Practice
origin.paragraph1: EasyLehrer is not an anonymous tech corporation. The platform emerged from a genuine need: colleagues were looking for a central hub for modern Swiss teaching materials, without having to wade through confusing databases.
origin.paragraph2: What started as a small exchange has become a growing community. We connect creativity with didactics and ensure that good work is fairly rewarded.

founders.title: Who's Behind EasyLehrer?
founders.paragraph1: We are two founders with different but perfectly complementary backgrounds: one of us comes from computer science, the other from education. Together, we recognized how much time and energy teachers invest in preparation every day — often at the expense of their own free time and quality of life.
founders.paragraph2: From this realization, the idea for EasyLehrer was born. We wanted to create a platform that truly makes teachers' daily lives easier: thoughtfully designed, practical, and tailored to Swiss needs.
founders.paragraph3: But we also know: a great platform isn't built in isolation. That's why your opinion is invaluable to us. Only through your feedback, ideas, and experiences from everyday school life can we continuously improve EasyLehrer. Together, we're building a platform that truly works — for you and with you.
founders.highlight: Your expertise makes the difference. Let's transform the teaching profession together.

sellerTerms.pageSubtitle: Please read these terms carefully before becoming a seller on EasyLehrer

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.content: These Seller Terms govern your use of EasyLehrer as a seller of teaching materials. By accepting these terms and completing the seller onboarding process, you agree to be bound by these conditions.

platformFee.title: 2. Platform Fee
platformFee.content: EasyLehrer charges a platform fee of 30% on all sales. This means:

breakdown.platform: EasyLehrer retains 30% as a platform fee
breakdown.example: Example: For a CHF 10.00 resource, you receive CHF 7.00

platformFee.note: Payment processing fees (Stripe fees) are included in the platform fee and are not charged separately to you.

payouts.title: 3. Payouts
payouts.content: Payouts are processed through Stripe Connect. Key details:

details.schedule: Payouts are processed automatically on a rolling basis (typically 2-7 business days after a sale)
details.minimum: There is no minimum payout threshold
details.currency: All transactions are in Swiss Francs (CHF)
details.account: You must complete Stripe's identity verification to receive payouts

contentPolicies.title: 4. Content Policies
contentPolicies.content: As a seller, you agree that all materials you upload:

requirements.original: Are your original work or you have the rights to sell them
requirements.appropriate: Are appropriate for educational use in Swiss schools
requirements.quality: Meet our quality standards for teaching materials
requirements.lp21: Are properly aligned with Lehrplan 21 where applicable

prohibited.title: 5. Prohibited Content
prohibited.content: The following content is strictly prohibited:

items.copyright: Copyrighted material you don't have rights to sell
items.plagiarized: Plagiarized or copied content from other sources
items.malicious: Files containing malware or malicious code
items.personal: Content containing personal data of students or others

responsibilities.title: 6. Seller Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: As a seller, you are responsible for:

items.accuracy: Ensuring the accuracy of your resource descriptions
items.support: Responding to buyer questions about your materials
items.updates: Updating materials if errors are discovered
items.taxes: Handling your own tax obligations for income earned
items.compliance: Complying with Swiss education standards and regulations

rights.remove: Remove content that violates these terms
rights.suspend: Suspend or terminate seller accounts for policy violations
rights.withhold: Withhold payouts if fraudulent activity is suspected

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms from time to time. Significant changes will be communicated via email. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to EasyLehrer. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. EasyLehrer is a Swiss platform connecting educators to buy, sell, and share high-quality teaching materials aligned with the Swiss curriculum (Lehrplan 21).

account.title: 2. Account Terms
account.content: To use certain features of EasyLehrer, you must create an account. You agree to:

items.accurate: Provide accurate and complete information during registration
items.secure: Keep your password secure and not share your account credentials
items.age: Be at least 18 years old or have parental consent to use the platform
items.oneAccount: Maintain only one account per person

acceptableUse.title: 3. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You agree to use EasyLehrer only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You must not:

items.lawful: Use the platform for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
items.noAbuse: Harass, abuse, or harm other users
items.noScraping: Attempt to scrape, copy, or redistribute content without permission
items.respectOthers: Infringe on the intellectual property rights of others

intellectualProperty.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on EasyLehrer, including the platform design, logos, and original materials, is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. Teaching materials uploaded by sellers remain the property of their respective creators, who grant buyers a limited license to use them for educational purposes.

purchases.title: 5. Purchases and Downloads
purchases.content: When you purchase teaching materials on EasyLehrer:

items.personal: You receive a personal, non-transferable license to use the materials
items.noRedistribution: You may not redistribute, resell, or share purchased materials
items.refunds: Refund requests are handled on a case-by-case basis through our support team

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: EasyLehrer provides the platform 'as is' and makes no warranties regarding the quality, accuracy, or fitness of teaching materials sold by third-party sellers. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the platform.

governingLaw.title: 7. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms of Service are governed by the laws of Switzerland. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Zurich, Switzerland.

contact.title: Questions?
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our contact page.
